definition: safe and sound (idiom)/to come out unscathed (e.g. from an accident or illness)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
sickness

sentences.english: No lives were lost, and we could wade ashore in safety.
sentences.chinese: 人都安然無恙，我們都能平安地涉水上岸。

sentences.english: He ran behind the wall anxiously, but Peter was all right.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙跑到那堵牆後面，發現彼得安然無恙。

sentences.english: We marvel(l)ed that they had escaped unhurt.
sentences.chinese: 我們感到驚奇的是他們竟安然無恙地逃了出來。

sentences.english: As long as the user is clicking and buying, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 只要用戶點擊廣告，購買商品，一切都會安然無恙。

sentences.english: When they saw that I did not sicken they grew afraid.
sentences.chinese: 當他們見到我安然無恙的時候，便開始害怕了。

sentences.english: Thanks to the doctor, I am safe and sound once again.
sentences.chinese: 多虧了那位大夫，我現在才又安然無恙了。

sentences.english: Your mother will be anxious until she hears you're safe.
sentences.chinese: 你媽媽只有在聽到你安然無恙時纔會放下心來。

sentences.english: The documents survived unmolested through centuries of war and upheaval.
sentences.chinese: 這些文件安然無恙地經過了多年的戰亂和發掘。

sentences.english: Bass see four xi come back safe and sound, quickly notice qingtian.
sentences.chinese: 劉利見四喜安然無恙地回來，急忙通知擎天。

sentences.english: The pilot pranged up the plane, but he was all right.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員使飛機墜毀，他卻安然無恙。

sentences.english: And I hope she is well.
He walked away from the accident completely unscathed.
sentences.chinese: 他安然無恙地從事故現場走開了。

sentences.english: Things went well for Lucarelli, his wife and his two little children as well.
sentences.chinese: 盧卡雷利夫婦二人以及兩個孩子也都安然無恙。

sentences.english: It then ensures both parties' wellbeing during the stay.
sentences.chinese: 然後該公司還要確保雙方在住旅館期間安然無恙。

sentences.english: We can now descend thousands of meters into the Earth with relative impunity.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們深入地球幾千米而安然無恙。

sentences.english: Your mother will be anxious until she hears you are set.
sentences.chinese: 你媽媽只有在聽到你安然無恙時纔會放下心來。

definition: safe and sound (idiom)
to stop/to obstruct
penniless (idiom)
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
to remain unmoved
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
as if relieved from a burden (idiom)/to have a weight off one's mind
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
to have one's wish fulfilled
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
to force someone to do something
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
to turn tears into laughter (idiom); to turn grief into happiness
